headline: PG&E Corporation, Lockheed Martin, Salesforce, and Wells Fargo Announce the Launch of EMBERPOINT LLC
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is included among the 12 Best Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Now On January 27, 2026, PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG), alongside Lockheed Martin, Salesforce, and Wells Fargo, announced the launch of EMBERPOINT LLC, a joint venture focused on wildfire detection, prevention, and response. The companies said EMBERPOINT will combine artificial intelligence, autonomous systems, […]

headline: Salesforce Lands Major Army AI Deal As Valuation Discount Persists
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) has been awarded a 10 year, US$5.6b contract with the U.S. Army to deliver secure data and AI technologies. The deal is described as one of the largest government cloud and AI agreements to date, focused on federal digital modernization. Salesforce also launched EMBERPOINT, an AI driven public safety alliance with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo. EMBERPOINT aims to apply Salesforce’s AI agent platforms, autonomous tech, and data tools to wildfire prevention and...

headline: Trump administration equity stakes pose risks to U.S. companies and markets
summary: The Trump administration's growing portfolio of direct investments is unprecedented outside an economic crisis or wartime.

headline: New U.S. Arms Export Policy Boosts Production of Weapons Important to Pentagon
summary: The new strategy will give priority to overseas partners that have invested in their own military defenses.
